item.title: Soul File Manager for Android
item.description: I’m excited to tell that I’ll have a new app soon on the Google Play Store for Android, it is called Soul, and it is a multiple view, remote access capable file manager. I’m currently testing and developing the latest details of it so in the next days or weeks you will be able to try it.
item.dc:creator: A.Perez

item.title: New blog
item.description:
It has been a long time since I last blogged. I’ve just set up this blog so I can start again.

See you soon!
item.dc:creator: A.Perez
